properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NICK, MEM_NAME, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_PHONE, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_GENDER, MEM_ADDRESS, MEM_INDATE, MEM_AGR, MEM_PIC, MEM_STATUS, MEM_OUTDATE, ROLE_ID, MEM_ACCESS, BLOCK_DATE, MEM_COOKIE, MEM_CATEGORY FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_COOKIE = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NICK, MEM_NAME, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_PHONE, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_GENDER, MEM_ADDRESS, MEM_INDATE, MEM_AGR, MEM_PIC, MEM_STATUS, MEM_OUTDATE, ROLE_ID, MEM_ACCESS, BLOCK_DATE, MEM_COOKIE, MEM_CATEGORY FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_COOKIE = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , MEM_NICK , MEM_GENDER , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_PHONE , MEM_ADDRESS , MEM_INDATE , MEM_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y' ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM MEMBER
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = 'N' , MEM_OUTDATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = ? AND MEM_EMAIL = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_EMAIL = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NICK = ?

INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NICK , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_GENDER , MEM_ADDRESS , MEM_AGR , MEM_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEM_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , MEM_NICK , MEM_BIRTH , NVL(MEM_GENDER, ' ') "mem_gender" , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_PHONE , NVL(MEM_ADDRESS, ' ') "mem_address" , TO_CHAR(MEM_INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "MEM_INDATE" , MEM_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , MEM_NICK , MEM_GENDER , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_PHONE , MEM_ADDRESS , MEM_INDATE , MEM_STATUS FROM MEMBER ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_BIRTH = ? , MEM_ID = ? , MEM_NAME = ? , MEM_NICK = ? , MEM_GENDER = ? , MEM_EMAIL = ? , MEM_PHONE = ? , MEM_ADDRESS = ? , MEM_STATUS = ? WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NICK = ? AND MEM_ID != ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ?, MEM_NICK = ?, MEM_NAME = ?, MEM_BIRTH = ?, MEM_PHONE = ?, MEM_EMAIL = ?, MEM_GENDER = ?, MEM_ADDRESS = ?, MEM_AGR = ?, MEM_CATEGORY = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEM_ID = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT QNA_NO , QNA_TITLE , QNA_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "REPORT_DATE" , NVL(ANS_CONTENT, ' ') "ANS_CONTENT" FROM QNA WHERE MEM_NO = ? ORDER BY 1 DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM QNA WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM GAME_QNA WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT REVIEW_NO , ENG_NAME , KOR_NAME , CONTENTS , RECOMMEND , R.UPLOAD_DATE , STAR_NO FROM REVIEW R JOIN GAME USING(GAME_NO) WHERE REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' AND R.MEM_NO = ?

SELECT REVIEW_NO , KOR_NAME , ENG_NAME , CONTENTS , RECOMMEND , TO_CHAR(R.UPLOAD_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') UPLOAD_DATE , STAR_NO , GAME_IMG FROM REVIEW R JOIN GAME G USING(GAME_NO) WHERE REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEM_NO = ? ORDER BY 6 DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT GQNA_NO , COMPANY_NAME , GQNA_TITLE , GQNA_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(GQNA_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "GQNA_DATE" , NVL(GQNA_ANSWER, ' ') "GQNA_ANSWER" , ENG_NAME FROM GAME_QNA JOIN COMPANY USING(COMPANY_NO) JOIN GAME USING(GAME_NO) WHERE GQNA_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEM_NO = ? ORDER BY 1 DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT DISTINCT GAME_NO , KOR_NAME , ENG_NAME , GAME_IMG , NVL(STAR_NO, 0) "STAR_NO" , TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') "PAY_DATE" FROM PAY P JOIN PAY_GAME USING(ORDER_NO) JOIN GAME USING(GAME_NO) LEFT JOIN REFUND USING(ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN REVIEW USING(GAME_NO) WHERE PAY_STATUS = '결제완료' AND (REFUND_STATUS IS NULL OR REFUND_STATUS = 'N') AND P.MEM_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , MEM_NICK , MEM_GENDER , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_PHONE , MEM_ADDRESS , MEM_INDATE , MEM_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE UPPER(MEM_ID) LIKE UPPER('%' || ? || '%') ORDER BY MEM_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
